str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Perfect Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a variation of genos; to procreate; figuratively, to regenerate.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
